import sys

def isPrime(val):
	for i  in range(2, val/2+1):
		if val%i == 0:
			return 0 #not prime
	return 1 #is prime

def isPalindrome(val):
	return val == val[::-1]

number = int(raw_input())
while(1):
	if isPalindrome(str(number)):
		if isPrime(number):
			print number
			sys.exit()
	number += 1
